title: EP 260: Toxicity 101 (Ft. Wellie)
itunes:title: EP 260: Toxicity 101 (Ft. Wellie)
description:
This week the girls are with Wellie Jackson to get all the insider scooper on what men really think and want from women.

Standards, status, and what actions actually annoy them

oOoOoOo this episode got some HOT takes yall!

If you want to share a heaux mail or heaux tale, email us at whoreibledecisions@gmail.com
